description:
Drocell is a puppetmaster who aids his boss in the kidnappings of young girls. He uses string as a weapon to strangle his targets. He even appears to be a puppet himself, as some of his reflexes are that of a doll`s.
he gets his head sliced open by Sebastian even though he made it to the bosses room before he collapsed and died.
name: Drocell Cainz
